section.title: MyFileHandler Class Reference

listitem.para: ArrayList< DirectChat > parseDirectChatCSV (String path)

This method parses the file on divice with value parameter path. This method copy data line per line. Than the data of a single line are used to generate a new instance of DirectChat. This DirectChat become added into the DirectChat typed Array-List. This Array List become returned.
ArrayList< DirectMessage > parseDirectChatMessageCSV (String path, int idx)

This method parses the file on divice with value parameter path. This method copy data line per line. Than the data of a single line are used to generate a new instance of DirectMessage. This DirectMessage become added into the DirectMessage typed Array-List. This Array List become returned.
ArrayList< Message > parseMessageCSV (String path, int room)

This method parses the file on divice with value parameter path. This method copy data line per line. Than the data of a single line are used to generate a new instance of Message. This Message become added into the Message typed Array-List. This Array List become returned.
ArrayList< User > parseUserCSV (String path)

This method parses the file on divice with value parameter path. This method copy data line per line. Than the data of a single line are used to generate a new instance of User. This User become added into the User typed Array-List. This Array List become returned.
ArrayList< Room > parseRoomsCSV (String path)

This method parses the file on divice with value parameter path. This method copy data line per line. Than the data of a single line are used to generate a new instance of Room. This Room become added into the Room typed Array-List. This Array List become returned.
ArrayList< Log > parseLogs (String path)

This method parses the file on divice with value parameter path. This method copy data line per line. Than the data of a single line are used to generate a new instance of Log. This Log become added into the Log typed Array-List. This Array List become returned.
String[] parseServerCFG (String path)
This method parses the file on divice with value of parameter path. This method copy data line per line into a string-typed-array. The string become returned.
int parseSitzung (Path path)
This method parse the file on divice with value of parameter path. Than it returns the value of sitzung casted into int.
void appendToFile (String path, String content)
This method appends the value of the parameter content to the file on device with the relative path.
void overwriteFile (String path, int idx, String content)
void overwriteFile (String path, int idx)
This is an overloaded alternative to MyFileHandler.overwriteFile().
void overwriteSitzung (String path, int sitzung)
This method overwrite the content of the file on device with relative Path path. The old value should be replaced with value of the parameter sitzung.
